type.description:
## Thundering

---


[Block Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/thundering).

Checks whether it's currently thundering in the world that the block is in.

Type ID: `apugli:thundering`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:thundering"
}
```
